mapper.select: SELECT wo.WORK_ORDER_NUM, eo.EO_NUM, eo.IDENTIFICATION, eo.CREATION_DATE, tl.DESCRIPTION EO_STATUS FROM mt_eo eo, mt_work_order wo, mt_gen_status gs, mt_gen_status_tl tl WHERE wo.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND wo.WORK_ORDER_ID = #{workOrderId} AND eo.WORK_ORDER_ID = wo.WORK_ORDER_ID AND gs.GEN_STATUS_ID = tl.GEN_STATUS_ID AND tl.LANG = #{lang} AND eo.`STATUS` IN ( 'WORKING', 'NEW', 'RELEASED' ) AND gs.MODULE = 'ORDER' AND gs.STATUS_GROUP = 'EO_STATUS' AND gs.STATUS_CODE = eo.`STATUS` AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM hme_eo_job_sn sn WHERE sn.eo_id = eo.EO_ID )

SELECT wo.WORK_ORDER_NUM, eo.EO_NUM, eo.IDENTIFICATION, eo.CREATION_DATE, mmw.WORKCELL_NAME PROCESS_NAME, concat( concat( TIMESTAMPDIFF( SECOND, ea.WORKING_DATE, now()) div 3600 div 24, '天' ), concat( TIMESTAMPDIFF( SECOND, ea.WORKING_DATE, now()) div 3600 mod 24, '时' ), concat( TIMESTAMPDIFF( SECOND, ea.WORKING_DATE, now()) mod 3600 div 60, '分' ), concat( TIMESTAMPDIFF( SECOND, ea.WORKING_DATE, now()) mod 60, '秒' )) DELAY_TIME FROM mt_eo eo, mt_work_order wo, mt_eo_router_actual ra, mt_eo_step_actual ea, mt_eo_step_wip sw left join mt_mod_organization_rel mmor on mmor.organization_id = sw.workcell_id and mmor.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'WORKCELL' AND mmor.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'WORKCELL' and mmor.top_site_id = #{siteId} and mmor.tenant_id = #{tenantId} left join mt_mod_workcell mmw on mmw.workcell_id = mmor.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_id WHERE wo.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND wo.WORK_ORDER_ID = #{workOrderId} and eo.WORK_ORDER_ID = wo.WORK_ORDER_ID and eo.EO_ID = ra.eo_id and ra.EO_ROUTER_ACTUAL_ID = ea.EO_ROUTER_ACTUAL_ID and ea.EO_STEP_ACTUAL_ID = sw.EO_STEP_ACTUAL_ID AND eo.`STATUS` = 'WORKING' and sw.TENANT_ID = wo.TENANT_ID AND sw.WORKCELL_ID <> '' AND sw.WORKCELL_ID IS NOT NULL order by eo.CREATION_DATE

SELECT wo.WORK_ORDER_NUM, eo.EO_NUM, eo.IDENTIFICATION, wo.PLAN_START_TIME, ea.ACTUAL_END_TIME FROM mt_eo eo, mt_work_order wo, mt_eo_actual ea WHERE wo.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND eo.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND wo.WORK_ORDER_ID = #{workOrderId} AND eo.WORK_ORDER_ID = wo.WORK_ORDER_ID AND eo.EO_ID = ea.eo_id AND ea.ACTUAL_END_TIME is not null

SELECT mma.AREA_ID FROM mt_mod_production_line mpl, mt_mod_organization_rel mor, mt_mod_organization_rel mor2, mt_mod_area mma WHERE mpl.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND mpl.PROD_LINE_ID = #{prodLineId} AND mor.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'AREA' AND mor.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'PROD_LINE' AND mor.ORGANIZATION_ID = mpl.PROD_LINE_ID AND mor.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND mor2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'AREA' AND mor2.ORGANIZATION_ID = mor.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID AND mor2.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'AREA' AND mor2.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND mma.AREA_ID = mor2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID AND mma.AREA_CATEGORY = 'SYB'
SELECT dr.cardid, dr.dt, dr.errcode errCode FROM Door_Record dr where dr.dt >= #{startTime} AND dr.cardid= #{loginName}
